definition[0]: a small container filled with powder that burns or explodes to produce coloured lights and noise in the sky
example[0]: a New Year’s Eve fireworks display
example[1]: Jeff and David were in the back yard setting off fireworks.
definition[1]: used to say that someone will be angry
example[2]: There’ll be fireworks if I get home late again.
definition[2]: something that is exciting or impressive
example[3]: The real fireworks are provided by Shakespeare’s poetry.
